title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Warzone Season 03 Reloaded: All the Details
description: The post Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Warzone Season 03 Reloaded: All the Details appeared first on Xbox Wire.
author: Joe Skrebels, Xbox Wire Editor-in-Chief
byline: April 29, 2025 by Call of Duty Staff
text: April 29, 2025 by Call of Duty Staff Season 03 Reloaded brings two new Multiplayer maps, Directed Mode for Shattered Veil, and new updates to Verdansk. Get new Loadout items like the Vendetta Perk and the Ladra SMG and participate in new events and more when the mid-season update launches on May 1! Season 03 Reloaded: Incoming Intel The Mystery Deepens The global search for the Pantheon moles accelerates as Operators revisit new territories revealed in the video Hudson recorded before his death.     Prepare for a wealth of new content in the mid-season update coming to Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone™, bringing new maps, modes, events, Loadout items, and more, including new features on Verdansk like a moving train and High Value Loot Zones. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Season 03 Reloaded arrives on Thursday, May 1 at 9AM PT across all platforms. Call of Duty: Black Ops 6: Season 03 Reloaded Two New Maps: Travel to an estate turned KGB safehouse in the mid-sized Haven, seeking out targets across the sprawling grounds and lavish interiors. In the new Signal Strike map, revisit the infamous Numbers Station as Operators battle above and below the water. Join Operations LTM: Test your endurance in a new multi-mode LTM complete with special breaks that introduce gameplay modifiers to every Operator in the field. New Perk: Seek out the enemy who eliminated you with the new Vendetta Perk, marking them out for elimination. Multiplayer Maps Haven Brand-New, Core, 6v6, Medium-Sized Head to a KBG safehouse established in a neglected estate, its aesthetics forgotten in favor of its usefulness as a base of operations. Fight for control of the command center built up in the old Ballroom and view an impressive array of armaments brought into the Hall. Reams of cable connect running generators and supplies at the Entrance promise an extended stay. Signal Brand-New, Strike, 6v6/2v2, Small-Sized Turn the clock back to 1968 when Pantheon moles infiltrated the Numbers Station, where water floods in through a breach in the walls and flames lap the upper walkways. Engage enemies in the central Broadcast center or fight through the flashing lights and alarms of the Control room. When things get heated, drop into the water below and swim behind enemy lines. Joint Operations Limited Time Mode Ride to victory in a blaze of glory in Joint Operations, a gauntlet that challenges players across a series of Multiplayer mode variants including Team Deathmatch, Domination, Hardpoint, Kill Order, and Kill Confirmed. Catch your breath during breaks throughout the match, shifting the play of the game by adding modifiers that effect every Operator, including a +420 Score Bonus, 3rd Person, Visual Impairment, Double Health, Hardcore, Paranoia Sounds, Low Gravity, Double Jump, and Increased Movement Speed. Battle in 6v6 across all five modes, their order randomized at the start of each match. Compete for two minutes in each mode, ending when one team reaches the Score Limit or at the conclusion of all five modes. The team with the most points wins the game. New Loadout Content Seek vengeance on the Operator who eliminated you with a new Multiplayer Perk that encourages payback. New Perk Perk: Vendetta Perk Slot: 2 Type: Recon (Blue) Available: Season 03 Reloaded Blaze of Glory Event Reward On respawn, mark your killer’s last known position for a short duration. Get a bonus score for eliminating that enemy. The Vigilance Perk counters being marked by Vendetta. Zombies: Season 03 Reloaded Content  Zombie Snacks LTM: Reach a flow state in the new Zombies Snacks limited-time mode, replacing your Operator’s health with an energy meter and granting special abilities to those who get in the flow. Returning Field Upgrade: Freeze the undead in their tracks with the Frost Blast Field Upgrade, complete with researchable Major and Minor Augments that further empower the blizzard attack. Shattered Veil – Directed Mode: Directed Mode arrives for Shattered Veil, providing round cap limitations and extra guidance when tackling the Main Quest. Get in the Flow in Zombie Snacks Whet your appetite in the Zombie Snacks limited-time mode, challenging Operators to keep their energy reserves up while aiming to enter a flow state, providing extra power for slaying the undead. Play Zombie Snacks on all five maps, including Shattered Veil, The Tomb, Citadelle des Morts, Terminus, and Liberty Falls, in both Standard and Directed playlists with the following gameplay changes: Energy Meter: In Zombie Snacks, your Operator’s health bar is replaced with an energy meter which depletes when taking damage or moving. The energy meter does not passively recharge. For that, you need food. In Standard, your energy depletes when moving or taking damage.  Jumping, mantling, sliding, and diving all deplete energy on use. In Directed Mode, your energy only depletes when taking damage. Replenish your energy by eating snacks (+50), drinking Perks (+150), or chewing a GobbleGum (+50).  Other health-based features will also refill energy, such as the Stimshot (+50) and the Light Mend Ammo Mod (+5 per glyph, +10 with the Extra Strength Augment).  The Jugger-Nog Perk will increase your total energy bar. Food Items: Eat food to partially replenish your energy meter, dropped by downed enemies and found throughout the map.  Specials, Elites, and HVTs are guaranteed to drop three snack items. Refrigerator Powerup: When activated, all eliminated zombies will drop food items for a short period of time. Nobody’s going hungry when this Power-Up drops. Flow Mode: Eliminate 10 zombies without taking damage to enter a flow state. Operators in the flow inflict plenty of extra damage and gain special boosts, such as improved handling and movement. Take any damage, and the flow state is lost. We suggest you turn up your music for this one. Earn GobbleGum rewards upon the first completion of the Main Quest in Standard or Directed Mode on any map: Directed: A custom collection of 4 GobbleGums per map. Each contains one high-rarity GobbleGum and 3 GobbleGums of other rarities. 15,000 XP per map, for a total of 75,000 XP across all maps. Standard: A custom collection of 6 GobbleGums per map. Each contains one high-rarity GobbleGum and 5 GobbleGums of other rarities.  15,000 XP per map, for a total of 75,000 XP across all maps. New Gameplay Content The Frost Blast Field Upgrade returns for Black Ops 6! Create a cyclone in front of your Operator and chill enemies to their bones. Additional Field Upgrade: Frost Blast Available: In-Season Blaze of Glory Event Reward Create a blizzard that deals lethal frost damage on activation and slows enemies that enter it. This Field Upgrade can be used in all five Zombies maps along with the previously accessible Field Upgrades, assuming it is chosen as part of your Loadout, or swapped via the menu during a game. Frost Blast: Major Augments Research the following Augments to further customize the Field Upgrade. Ice Slick Enemies within the blizzard may be knocked down. Frost Cast The blizzard moves forward when activated. Flash Freeze Normal enemies within the blizzard will be frozen solid and are killed when damaged. Frost Blast: Minor Augments Extension Significantly increases blizzard duration. Frostbite Increase damage to frozen enemies. Extra Charge Increase max charges by one. Shattered Veil: Directed Mode Get some extra guidance when taking on the Main Quest in Shattered Veil with the arrival of Directed Mode in Season 03 Reloaded. Head to Colton Hall in the wooded hills above Liberty Falls and deliver the Sentinel Artifact to S.A.M. with a maximum round cap of 15. Battle the Elder Disciple and its empowered minions, and keep your ears peeled for Toxic Zombies, which screech as they rush your position and explode, leaving a damaging pool of acid in their wake. Fight back with the upgraded Ray Gun Mark II and burst enemies apart with the Microwave Trap. In the halls and grounds of this old mansion, the team will need every advantage they can get. Ray Gun Mark II Comes to All Maps Ever wanted to wield the Ray Gun Mark II as an additional Wonder Weapon on Liberty Falls, or maybe Citadelle des Morts? With Season 03 Reloaded, now you can. Treyarch is adding the base version of the Ray Gun Mark II to the Mystery Box on all existing Zombies maps to expand your arsenal even further. Call of Duty: Warzone: Season 03 Reloaded Content  New Features in Verdansk: Hop on the train, fight for the best gear in High Value Loot Zones, tear through Downtown on the Triumph TF 250-X, and compete in Verdansk for this season of Battle Royale Ranked Play. Get intel on all the mid-season changes coming to Verdansk. Two Limited-Time Modes: Spice up your Verdansk deployments with two mid-season LTMs, High Trip Resurgence and Massive Resurgence. New Features in Verdansk The battle rages on as millions of players continue deploying to the original Big Map. Verdansk’s return has taken the community by storm with more features coming to the map in the mid-season update, including two limited-time modes. Plus, expect continued support for Rebirth Island Resurgence and the Battle Royale Casual mode on Verdansk introduced at the start of Season 03. All Aboard! The Verdansk Train Station is back in business, sending a loot-filled train around Verdansk with multiple access points and a free ride for those who can defend against approaching enemies. Let off some steam and climb aboard, if your fellow passengers don’t stop you first. Engage with other fan-favorite Battle Royale features coming in the mid-season, including: High Value Loot Zones: Be a risk taker and search for powerful gear in High Value Loot Zones. Be ready to engage enemy squads eager to compete for the quality loot on hand. More Contracts: Track down and eliminate the Operator with the highest number of eliminations when picking up the Big Game Bounty Contract. If you’re looking for a ride, get on board and hold your position with the Train Recon Contract. New Vehicle: Mount up for a thrilling ride on the tried-and-true Triumph TF 250-X, already available in Rebirth Island and coming to Verdansk in the mid-season update. Battle Royale Ranked Play in Verdansk It’s time to show how well you really know the lay of the land. For the first time in the map’s history, Verdansk will be featured in Battle Royale Ranked Play, returning in the mid-season as players squad up in Trios and seek to dominate 49 other teams as 150 players spread out through Verdansk in search of the best placement they can get. Earn Skill Rating (SR) points for outlasting squads, eliminating opponents, and completing challenges. The amount of SR earned for getting eliminations will be greater or lesser depending on the comparison between your rank and your target’s rank. Earn seasonal rewards for reaching milestones in the remainder of Season 03, including:  Season 03 Ranked Play Rewards Get 25 Eliminations: “Crownbreaker” Weapon Sticker Get 100 Eliminations: “Ranked Renegade” Weapon Camo Win a Ranked Play match: "Junkyard Dog" Weapon Charm Get 250 Eliminations: “Exile’s Resolve” Assault Rifle Blueprint Silver: “Platatag” Emblem Gold: “Arumural” Emblem and “Golden Cup” Spray Platinum: “Platinumpasting” Emblem and “Platinum Blet” Spray Diamond: “Blue Carbon Style” Emblem and “Diamond Crown” Spray Crimson: “Crimsonpiece” Emblem and “Crimson Banner” Spray Iridescent: “Iridosketch” Emblem and “Iridescent Wreath” Spray Top 250: “Factum Heroes” Emblem and “Unstoppable 250” Spray #1 Overall: “Semideistsyle” Emblem Two Verdansk Limited Time Modes High Trip Resurgence: Smoke the competition and power up in the High Trip Resurgence LTM coming to Verdansk. Operators will deploy with one of several predetermined weapons and their fists. To improve your odds, seek out Shades found in supply caches, giving the Operator various boosts , including faster reloads, super speed, and no fall damage. Massive Resurgence: Up the competition with support for 120 Operators on Verdansk Resurgence. Stay alive to redeploy fallen squadmates and be ready to engage enemies with greater frequency in this last squad standing battle.  Call of Duty: Black Ops 6: General Content (MP, ZM, WZ) Weapon Detail: Get info on the new Ladra SMG, combining a high fire rate with excellent range. For a more explosive approach, equip the 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion for the Goblin Mk 2. New Events: Unlock the Ladra and 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion in the High Art Event featuring Seth Rogen. Unlock the Vendetta Perk, Frost Blast Field Upgrade, and more in the Blaze of Glory and Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Got Your Six Events. New Store Offerings: Check out new Ultra, Reactive, and Mastercraft Skins across several new Bundles arriving in the mid-season Store, including the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) United Force: Tracer Pack which supports veterans in their search for high-quality jobs. Weapon Detail Wield the blistering-fast Ladra SMG, arriving as an event reward in the mid-season update.  Primary Weapon: Ladra SMG, High Art Event Reward Levels: 37 MAGS: 4 MAG SIZE: 38 Mastery Badges: Yes Attachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire Mods Customize Options: Skins, Camo and Reticle Unlocks (MP, ZM, WZ), Accessories (1), Decals (1), Stickers (3). Full-auto submachine gun. Extreme rate of fire, excellent range, and low recoil. Headshots can help offset lower base damage. Combining a high fire rate with excellent range and low recoil, the Ladra SMG can compete with the best even out to the mid-range. More shots are needed due to the weapon’s lower base damage, so consider an Extended Mag, Scavenger, or the Assault Pack to keep your ammo stocked through even the thickest of fights. New: Special Weapon Attachments  Goblin Mk2 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion Goblin Mk2, Assault Rifle, High Art Event Reward Converts the Goblin Mk2 into a fully automatic weapon with explosive rocket ammunition. Splash damage capabilities come at the expense of bullet velocity and rate of fire. Equips a new default Barrel and Magazine. Blocks Barrel, Muzzle, and Magazine Attachments. Season 03 Reloaded Events Earn XP and unlock rewards including the new Season 03 Reloaded Ladra SMG, the 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion for the Goblin Mk2, and more across three in-game Events. High Art (MP, ZM, WZ) Activation Dates: May 1 to 15 Join actor, comedian, and filmmaker Seth Rogen on an epic High Art journey. Earn XP in Multiplayer, Zombies, or Call of Duty: Warzone while the event is live to earn rewards like the new Ladra SMG. Purchase the premium track to earn additional rewards including the Seth Rogen Operator. Free Track Get explosive with the 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion for the Goblin Mk2 along with other Free Track rewards like the “Casual Ops” Operator Skin for Stone plus a unique Spray, Weapon Charm, Sticker, a Loading Screen and Emblem featuring Seth Rogen, and a one-hour Double Battle Pass XP token. Free Track Mastery Reward: Ladra SMG Complete the Free Track to unlock the new Ladra SMG, boasting a high fire rate combined with excellent range and low recoil. Get More with the Premium Reward Track Players who purchase the Premium Track for 1100 COD Points will also unlock along a second track featuring additional rewards including the instantly unlocked “Fired Up” Operator Skin for the new Seth Rogen Operator plus progress through the Premium Track to unlock additional items  the “Glazed Out” Assault Rifle and “Flameware” SMG Weapon Blueprints, “Missed ‘Em” Finishing Move, and a new Calling Card, Emote, Large Decal, Gunscreen, and one-hour Double XP Token. Ultimate Mastery Reward: “Host Rogen” Operator Skin Deploy as Seth Rogen in a new Operator Skin featuring the actor in a colorful jacket and tie and black-rimmed glasses. Event: Blaze of Glory (MP, ZM, WZ) Activation Dates: May 6 to 15 Collect Blaze Bucks dropped by eliminated enemies and found in supply caches in Call of Duty: Warzone. Redeem your bucks for rewards, including the new Vendetta Perk, the Frost Blast Field Upgrade, and the “Highly Decorated” Weapon Camo with an additional variant for Season 03 BlackCell owners. New Store Offerings Look forward to a variety of Ultra, Reactive, and Mastercraft Skins across a variety of exciting Bundles coming to the mid-season Store. Here are some highlights. Check the Store throughout the mid-season for more. Tracer Pack: Seaborne Mastercraft Ultra Skin Command the seas and fight as a cephalopod with the “Sea Rogue” Ultra Skin for Woods, geared up with the Mastercraft “Nautiloid” HDR Sniper Rifle and “Inkspine” Saug SMG Weapon Blueprints, both featuring Cannon Fire Tracers and Anchor Crush Death FX. Sweep them off their feet with the “Harpoon Doom” Finishing Move and celebrate victory using the “You’re Sunk!” Emote. Climb out of the depths and become the master of the sea with the “Pearly” Weapon Charm, animated “Sea Nightmare” Emblem, “There Be Treasure!” Spray, “Aye Aye Cap!” Weapon Sticker, and a Loading Screen. Tracer Pack: Peek Performance Reactive Ultra Skin It’s nothing that a little needle and thread can’t fix when deploying as the “Mr. Peeks” Operator Skin based on everyone’s favorite Mystery Box stuffed animal. Go for the win with the Reactive “Egg Breaker” PPSh-41 SMG, “Gummy Disaster” Feng 82 LMG, and the “Fudgey” Maelstrom Shotgun Weapon Blueprints, all three equipped with Blue and Pink Tracers and Chocolate Eggs Death FX. Give your enemies something to bite on with the “Chew This!” Finishing Move, “Unlimited Power!” Large Decal, a Loading Screen, and one consumable Hidden Power GobbleGum. Tracer Pack: Charm ‘n Harm Reactive Ultra Skin Hex the competition with the Ultra Reactive “Hocus” XMG LMG Weapon Blueprint, a masterclass in magical design, paired with the “Pocus” KSV SMG Blueprint, both featuring Pink Tracers and Nebula Death FX. Revel in the nightfall as the “Arcana Conqueror” Operator Skin or drive away your enemies as the “Solar Diviner” Operator Skin. Spellbind enemies with the “Plaything” Finishing Move and put your powers on display with the “Hoot Hoot” Weapon Charm, “Devastating Rage” Weapon Sticker, animated “Wand Way” Calling Card, “Behold the Power!” Spray, and a Reticle and Loading Screen. Tracer Pack: Dulce Catástrofe A colorful storm is heading to combat as the new Dulce Catástrofe Bundle celebrates Cinco de Mayo by bringing a fresh, festive twist to your Loadouts inspired by vibrant party traditions and packed with high-impact style.  Deploy with the “Goloso” Operator Skin outfitted with the “Dale!” Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprint, “No Te Pierdas” Sniper Rifle Weapon Blueprint, and “Trancazo Festivo” Melee Weapon Blueprint. Plus, light up the party in Multiplayer and Call of Duty: Warzone with the “Golpe Sorpresa” Emote, “Pinatastico” Weapon Charm, “Explosive Festivity” Emblem, and “Candy! Candy! Candy!” Spray. Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Military Appreciation Month Presented by USAA The Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Military Appreciation Month presented by USAA kicks off May 1, and will honor service members and veterans for having our six. Arriving soon are the C.O.D.E. United Force: Tracer Pack and accompanying C.O.D.E. Got Your Six Event. Follow the Endowment on social media for updates on how you can support US and UK military veterans seeking high-quality jobs throughout Military Appreciation Month. Upgrade to Black Ops 6 Today!  Black Ops 6 is available now, and there’s never been a better time to experience the spy action thriller Campaign, the in-depth tactical chaos of best-in-class Multiplayer, and soak in the gory glory of an incredible round-based Zombies experience! Click here to Purchase Black Ops 6. © 2024-2025 Activision Publishing, Inc. ACTIVISION, CALL OF DUTY, CALL OF DUTY WARZONE, and CALL OF DUTY BLACK OPS are trademarks of Activision Publishing, Inc. All other trademarks and trade names are the property of their respective owners. For more information, please visit www.callofduty.com and www.youtube.com/callofduty, and follow @Activision and @CallofDuty on X, Instagram, and Facebook. For Call of Duty Updates, follow @CODUpdates on X.
html:
April 29, 2025

by Call of Duty Staff

Season 03 Reloaded brings two new Multiplayer maps, Directed Mode for Shattered Veil, and new updates to Verdansk. Get new Loadout items like the Vendetta Perk and the Ladra SMG and participate in new events and more when the mid-season update launches on May 1!

Season 03 Reloaded: Incoming Intel

The Mystery Deepens

The global search for the Pantheon moles accelerates as Operators revisit new territories revealed in the video Hudson recorded before his death.    

Prepare for a wealth of new content in the mid-season update coming to Call of Duty®: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone™, bringing new maps, modes, events, Loadout items, and more, including new features on Verdansk like a moving train and High Value Loot Zones.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 Season 03 Reloaded arrives on Thursday, May 1 at 9AM PT across all platforms.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6: Season 03 Reloaded

Two New Maps: Travel to an estate turned KGB safehouse in the mid-sized Haven, seeking out targets across the sprawling grounds and lavish interiors. In the new Signal Strike map, revisit the infamous Numbers Station as Operators battle above and below the water.

Join Operations LTM: Test your endurance in a new multi-mode LTM complete with special breaks that introduce gameplay modifiers to every Operator in the field.

New Perk: Seek out the enemy who eliminated you with the new Vendetta Perk, marking them out for elimination.

Multiplayer Maps

Haven

Brand-New, Core, 6v6, Medium-Sized

Head to a KBG safehouse established in a neglected estate, its aesthetics forgotten in favor of its usefulness as a base of operations. Fight for control of the command center built up in the old Ballroom and view an impressive array of armaments brought into the Hall. Reams of cable connect running generators and supplies at the Entrance promise an extended stay.

Signal

Brand-New, Strike, 6v6/2v2, Small-Sized

Turn the clock back to 1968 when Pantheon moles infiltrated the Numbers Station, where water floods in through a breach in the walls and flames lap the upper walkways. Engage enemies in the central Broadcast center or fight through the flashing lights and alarms of the Control room. When things get heated, drop into the water below and swim behind enemy lines.

Joint Operations Limited Time Mode

Ride to victory in a blaze of glory in Joint Operations, a gauntlet that challenges players across a series of Multiplayer mode variants including Team Deathmatch, Domination, Hardpoint, Kill Order, and Kill Confirmed.

Catch your breath during breaks throughout the match, shifting the play of the game by adding modifiers that effect every Operator, including a +420 Score Bonus, 3rd Person, Visual Impairment, Double Health, Hardcore, Paranoia Sounds, Low Gravity, Double Jump, and Increased Movement Speed.

Battle in 6v6 across all five modes, their order randomized at the start of each match. Compete for two minutes in each mode, ending when one team reaches the Score Limit or at the conclusion of all five modes. The team with the most points wins the game.

New Loadout Content

Seek vengeance on the Operator who eliminated you with a new Multiplayer Perk that encourages payback.

New Perk

Perk: Vendetta

Perk Slot: 2

Type: Recon (Blue)

Available: Season 03 Reloaded Blaze of Glory Event Reward

On respawn, mark your killer’s last known position for a short duration. Get a bonus score for eliminating that enemy. The Vigilance Perk counters being marked by Vendetta.

Zombies: Season 03 Reloaded Content 

Zombie Snacks LTM: Reach a flow state in the new Zombies Snacks limited-time mode, replacing your Operator’s health with an energy meter and granting special abilities to those who get in the flow.

Returning Field Upgrade: Freeze the undead in their tracks with the Frost Blast Field Upgrade, complete with researchable Major and Minor Augments that further empower the blizzard attack.

Shattered Veil – Directed Mode: Directed Mode arrives for Shattered Veil, providing round cap limitations and extra guidance when tackling the Main Quest.

Get in the Flow in Zombie Snacks

Whet your appetite in the Zombie Snacks limited-time mode, challenging Operators to keep their energy reserves up while aiming to enter a flow state, providing extra power for slaying the undead.

Play Zombie Snacks on all five maps, including Shattered Veil, The Tomb, Citadelle des Morts, Terminus, and Liberty Falls, in both Standard and Directed playlists with the following gameplay changes:

Energy Meter: In Zombie Snacks, your Operator’s health bar is replaced with an energy meter which depletes when taking damage or moving. The energy meter does not passively recharge. For that, you need food.

  • In Standard, your energy depletes when moving or taking damage.  Jumping, mantling, sliding, and diving all deplete energy on use. In Directed Mode, your energy only depletes when taking damage.
  • Replenish your energy by eating snacks (+50), drinking Perks (+150), or chewing a GobbleGum (+50).  Other health-based features will also refill energy, such as the Stimshot (+50) and the Light Mend Ammo Mod (+5 per glyph, +10 with the Extra Strength Augment). 
  • The Jugger-Nog Perk will increase your total energy bar.

Food Items: Eat food to partially replenish your energy meter, dropped by downed enemies and found throughout the map. 

  • Specials, Elites, and HVTs are guaranteed to drop three snack items.

Refrigerator Powerup: When activated, all eliminated zombies will drop food items for a short period of time. Nobody’s going hungry when this Power-Up drops.

Flow Mode: Eliminate 10 zombies without taking damage to enter a flow state. Operators in the flow inflict plenty of extra damage and gain special boosts, such as improved handling and movement. Take any damage, and the flow state is lost. We suggest you turn up your music for this one.

Earn GobbleGum rewards upon the first completion of the Main Quest in Standard or Directed Mode on any map:

  • Directed: A custom collection of 4 GobbleGums per map.
    • Each contains one high-rarity GobbleGum and 3 GobbleGums of other rarities.
    • 15,000 XP per map, for a total of 75,000 XP across all maps.
  • Standard: A custom collection of 6 GobbleGums per map.
    • Each contains one high-rarity GobbleGum and 5 GobbleGums of other rarities. 
    • 15,000 XP per map, for a total of 75,000 XP across all maps.

New Gameplay Content

The Frost Blast Field Upgrade returns for Black Ops 6! Create a cyclone in front of your Operator and chill enemies to their bones.

Additional Field Upgrade: Frost Blast

Available: In-Season Blaze of Glory Event Reward

Create a blizzard that deals lethal frost damage on activation and slows enemies that enter it.

This Field Upgrade can be used in all five Zombies maps along with the previously accessible Field Upgrades, assuming it is chosen as part of your Loadout, or swapped via the menu during a game.

Frost Blast: Major Augments

Research the following Augments to further customize the Field Upgrade.

Ice Slick

Enemies within the blizzard may be knocked down.

Frost Cast

The blizzard moves forward when activated.

Flash Freeze

Normal enemies within the blizzard will be frozen solid and are killed when damaged.

Frost Blast: Minor Augments

Extension

Significantly increases blizzard duration.

Frostbite

Increase damage to frozen enemies.

Extra Charge

Increase max charges by one.

Shattered Veil: Directed Mode

Get some extra guidance when taking on the Main Quest in Shattered Veil with the arrival of Directed Mode in Season 03 Reloaded. Head to Colton Hall in the wooded hills above Liberty Falls and deliver the Sentinel Artifact to S.A.M. with a maximum round cap of 15.

Battle the Elder Disciple and its empowered minions, and keep your ears peeled for Toxic Zombies, which screech as they rush your position and explode, leaving a damaging pool of acid in their wake. Fight back with the upgraded Ray Gun Mark II and burst enemies apart with the Microwave Trap. In the halls and grounds of this old mansion, the team will need every advantage they can get.

Ray Gun Mark II Comes to All Maps

Ever wanted to wield the Ray Gun Mark II as an additional Wonder Weapon on Liberty Falls, or maybe Citadelle des Morts? With Season 03 Reloaded, now you can. Treyarch is adding the base version of the Ray Gun Mark II to the Mystery Box on all existing Zombies maps to expand your arsenal even further.

Call of Duty: Warzone: Season 03 Reloaded Content 

New Features in Verdansk: Hop on the train, fight for the best gear in High Value Loot Zones, tear through Downtown on the Triumph TF 250-X, and compete in Verdansk for this season of Battle Royale Ranked Play. Get intel on all the mid-season changes coming to Verdansk.

Two Limited-Time Modes: Spice up your Verdansk deployments with two mid-season LTMs, High Trip Resurgence and Massive Resurgence.

New Features in Verdansk

The battle rages on as millions of players continue deploying to the original Big Map. Verdansk’s return has taken the community by storm with more features coming to the map in the mid-season update, including two limited-time modes. Plus, expect continued support for Rebirth Island Resurgence and the Battle Royale Casual mode on Verdansk introduced at the start of Season 03.

All Aboard!

The Verdansk Train Station is back in business, sending a loot-filled train around Verdansk with multiple access points and a free ride for those who can defend against approaching enemies. Let off some steam and climb aboard, if your fellow passengers don’t stop you first.

Engage with other fan-favorite Battle Royale features coming in the mid-season, including:

High Value Loot Zones: Be a risk taker and search for powerful gear in High Value Loot Zones. Be ready to engage enemy squads eager to compete for the quality loot on hand.

More Contracts: Track down and eliminate the Operator with the highest number of eliminations when picking up the Big Game Bounty Contract. If you’re looking for a ride, get on board and hold your position with the Train Recon Contract.

New Vehicle: Mount up for a thrilling ride on the tried-and-true Triumph TF 250-X, already available in Rebirth Island and coming to Verdansk in the mid-season update.

Battle Royale Ranked Play in Verdansk

It’s time to show how well you really know the lay of the land. For the first time in the map’s history, Verdansk will be featured in Battle Royale Ranked Play, returning in the mid-season as players squad up in Trios and seek to dominate 49 other teams as 150 players spread out through Verdansk in search of the best placement they can get.

Earn Skill Rating (SR) points for outlasting squads, eliminating opponents, and completing challenges. The amount of SR earned for getting eliminations will be greater or lesser depending on the comparison between your rank and your target’s rank.

Earn seasonal rewards for reaching milestones in the remainder of Season 03, including: 

Season 03 Ranked Play Rewards

  • Get 25 Eliminations: “Crownbreaker” Weapon Sticker
  • Get 100 Eliminations: “Ranked Renegade” Weapon Camo
  • Win a Ranked Play match: "Junkyard Dog" Weapon Charm
  • Get 250 Eliminations: “Exile’s Resolve” Assault Rifle Blueprint
  • Silver: “Platatag” Emblem
  • Gold: “Arumural” Emblem and “Golden Cup” Spray
  • Platinum: “Platinumpasting” Emblem and “Platinum Blet” Spray
  • Diamond: “Blue Carbon Style” Emblem and “Diamond Crown” Spray
  • Crimson: “Crimsonpiece” Emblem and “Crimson Banner” Spray
  • Iridescent: “Iridosketch” Emblem and “Iridescent Wreath” Spray
  • Top 250: “Factum Heroes” Emblem and “Unstoppable 250” Spray
  • #1 Overall: “Semideistsyle” Emblem

Two Verdansk Limited Time Modes

High Trip Resurgence: Smoke the competition and power up in the High Trip Resurgence LTM coming to Verdansk. Operators will deploy with one of several predetermined weapons and their fists. To improve your odds, seek out Shades found in supply caches, giving the Operator various boosts , including faster reloads, super speed, and no fall damage.

Massive Resurgence: Up the competition with support for 120 Operators on Verdansk Resurgence. Stay alive to redeploy fallen squadmates and be ready to engage enemies with greater frequency in this last squad standing battle. 

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6: General Content (MP, ZM, WZ)

Weapon Detail: Get info on the new Ladra SMG, combining a high fire rate with excellent range. For a more explosive approach, equip the 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion for the Goblin Mk 2.

New Events: Unlock the Ladra and 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion in the High Art Event featuring Seth Rogen. Unlock the Vendetta Perk, Frost Blast Field Upgrade, and more in the Blaze of Glory and Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Got Your Six Events.

New Store Offerings: Check out new Ultra, Reactive, and Mastercraft Skins across several new Bundles arriving in the mid-season Store, including the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) United Force: Tracer Pack which supports veterans in their search for high-quality jobs.

Weapon Detail

Wield the blistering-fast Ladra SMG, arriving as an event reward in the mid-season update. 

Primary Weapon: Ladra

SMG, High Art Event Reward

Levels: 37

MAGS: 4

MAG SIZE: 38

Mastery Badges: Yes

Attachments: Optic, Muzzle, Barrel, Underbarrel, Magazine, Rear Grip, Stock, Laser, Fire Mods

Customize Options: Skins, Camo and Reticle Unlocks (MP, ZM, WZ), Accessories (1), Decals (1), Stickers (3).

Full-auto submachine gun. Extreme rate of fire, excellent range, and low recoil. Headshots can help offset lower base damage.

Combining a high fire rate with excellent range and low recoil, the Ladra SMG can compete with the best even out to the mid-range. More shots are needed due to the weapon’s lower base damage, so consider an Extended Mag, Scavenger, or the Assault Pack to keep your ammo stocked through even the thickest of fights.


New: Special Weapon Attachments 

Goblin Mk2 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion

Goblin Mk2, Assault Rifle, High Art Event Reward

Converts the Goblin Mk2 into a fully automatic weapon with explosive rocket ammunition. Splash damage capabilities come at the expense of bullet velocity and rate of fire. Equips a new default Barrel and Magazine. Blocks Barrel, Muzzle, and Magazine Attachments.

Season 03 Reloaded Events

Earn XP and unlock rewards including the new Season 03 Reloaded Ladra SMG, the 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion for the Goblin Mk2, and more across three in-game Events.

High Art (MP, ZM, WZ)

Activation Dates: May 1 to 15

Join actor, comedian, and filmmaker Seth Rogen on an epic High Art journey. Earn XP in Multiplayer, Zombies, or Call of Duty: Warzone while the event is live to earn rewards like the new Ladra SMG. Purchase the premium track to earn additional rewards including the Seth Rogen Operator.

Free Track

Get explosive with the 7.62 Mini-Rocket Conversion for the Goblin Mk2 along with other Free Track rewards like the “Casual Ops” Operator Skin for Stone plus a unique Spray, Weapon Charm, Sticker, a Loading Screen and Emblem featuring Seth Rogen, and a one-hour Double Battle Pass XP token.

Free Track Mastery Reward: Ladra SMG

Complete the Free Track to unlock the new Ladra SMG, boasting a high fire rate combined with excellent range and low recoil.

Get More with the Premium Reward Track

Players who purchase the Premium Track for 1100 COD Points will also unlock along a second track featuring additional rewards including the instantly unlocked “Fired Up” Operator Skin for the new Seth Rogen Operator plus progress through the Premium Track to unlock additional items  the “Glazed Out” Assault Rifle and “Flameware” SMG Weapon Blueprints, “Missed ‘Em” Finishing Move, and a new Calling Card, Emote, Large Decal, Gunscreen, and one-hour Double XP Token.

Ultimate Mastery Reward: “Host Rogen” Operator Skin

Deploy as Seth Rogen in a new Operator Skin featuring the actor in a colorful jacket and tie and black-rimmed glasses.

Event: Blaze of Glory (MP, ZM, WZ)

Activation Dates: May 6 to 15

Collect Blaze Bucks dropped by eliminated enemies and found in supply caches in Call of Duty: Warzone. Redeem your bucks for rewards, including the new Vendetta Perk, the Frost Blast Field Upgrade, and the “Highly Decorated” Weapon Camo with an additional variant for Season 03 BlackCell owners.

New Store Offerings

Look forward to a variety of Ultra, Reactive, and Mastercraft Skins across a variety of exciting Bundles coming to the mid-season Store. Here are some highlights. Check the Store throughout the mid-season for more.

Tracer Pack: Seaborne Mastercraft Ultra Skin

Command the seas and fight as a cephalopod with the “Sea Rogue” Ultra Skin for Woods, geared up with the Mastercraft “Nautiloid” HDR Sniper Rifle and “Inkspine” Saug SMG Weapon Blueprints, both featuring Cannon Fire Tracers and Anchor Crush Death FX. Sweep them off their feet with the “Harpoon Doom” Finishing Move and celebrate victory using the “You’re Sunk!” Emote.

Climb out of the depths and become the master of the sea with the “Pearly” Weapon Charm, animated “Sea Nightmare” Emblem, “There Be Treasure!” Spray, “Aye Aye Cap!” Weapon Sticker, and a Loading Screen.

Tracer Pack: Peek Performance Reactive Ultra Skin

It’s nothing that a little needle and thread can’t fix when deploying as the “Mr. Peeks” Operator Skin based on everyone’s favorite Mystery Box stuffed animal. Go for the win with the Reactive “Egg Breaker” PPSh-41 SMG, “Gummy Disaster” Feng 82 LMG, and the “Fudgey” Maelstrom Shotgun Weapon Blueprints, all three equipped with Blue and Pink Tracers and Chocolate Eggs Death FX.

Give your enemies something to bite on with the “Chew This!” Finishing Move, “Unlimited Power!” Large Decal, a Loading Screen, and one consumable Hidden Power GobbleGum.

Tracer Pack: Charm ‘n Harm Reactive Ultra Skin

Hex the competition with the Ultra Reactive “Hocus” XMG LMG Weapon Blueprint, a masterclass in magical design, paired with the “Pocus” KSV SMG Blueprint, both featuring Pink Tracers and Nebula Death FX. Revel in the nightfall as the “Arcana Conqueror” Operator Skin or drive away your enemies as the “Solar Diviner” Operator Skin.

Spellbind enemies with the “Plaything” Finishing Move and put your powers on display with the “Hoot Hoot” Weapon Charm, “Devastating Rage” Weapon Sticker, animated “Wand Way” Calling Card, “Behold the Power!” Spray, and a Reticle and Loading Screen.

Tracer Pack: Dulce Catástrofe

A colorful storm is heading to combat as the new Dulce Catástrofe Bundle celebrates Cinco de Mayo by bringing a fresh, festive twist to your Loadouts inspired by vibrant party traditions and packed with high-impact style. 

Deploy with the “Goloso” Operator Skin outfitted with the “Dale!” Assault Rifle Weapon Blueprint, “No Te Pierdas” Sniper Rifle Weapon Blueprint, and “Trancazo Festivo” Melee Weapon Blueprint. Plus, light up the party in Multiplayer and Call of Duty: Warzone with the “Golpe Sorpresa” Emote, “Pinatastico” Weapon Charm, “Explosive Festivity” Emblem, and “Candy! Candy! Candy!” Spray.

Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Military Appreciation Month Presented by USAA

The Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Military Appreciation Month presented by USAA kicks off May 1, and will honor service members and veterans for having our six. Arriving soon are the C.O.D.E. United Force: Tracer Pack and accompanying C.O.D.E. Got Your Six Event.

Follow the Endowment on social media for updates on how you can support US and UK military veterans seeking high-quality jobs throughout Military Appreciation Month.
